title: Social Media Teaser
task: Release the first teaser video with the theme 'Your headphones will understand you' to attract target audience attention.

title: Countdown Activity
task: Start daily countdown posts and invite consumer participation in interactive giveaways to win limited trial devices.

title: Design Department Deliverables
task: Provide complete appearance models and product renderings for social media materials.

title: Product Launch Event
task: Organize an online and offline launch event at the company's flagship experience store, inviting media and tech experts to introduce the product's innovative features and use scenarios.

title: Product Demo Video
task: Complete the filming and editing of the product feature demonstration video as the core visual content for the launch event.
person: R&D and Marketing visual design team

title: Digital Advertising Campaign
task: Launch the first wave of digital advertising targeting tech enthusiasts and health-conscious lifestyle groups aged 25-45.

title: Joint Branding Activity
task: Initiate a joint branding event with a well-known sports brand to launch a limited edition co-branded headphone.

title: Consumer Emotional Connection Video
task: Complete three different scenario advertisement videos showcasing the headphone's value in daily life, sports, and work scenarios.

title: First Round of Internal Testing
task: Complete the first round of internal testing by inviting employees and internal partners to experience the product and provide feedback.

title: Market Testing
task: Launch small-scale market testing to collect feedback from at least 300 users and make adjustments based on feedback.
